resources.string: Customize your ye ye ash phone
Press on color below to apply

Double tap statusbar to put the device to sleep
Double tap on the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Modify the shortcuts shown in the lockscreen

Spark-Os is based on aosp and was created on january 2021
